threads.subject: June sales numbers - draft
threads.body:
Team,
Attached is the draft sales numbers for June. Please review and send feedback.
Thanks,
Mike

threads.subject: Re: June sales numbers - draft
threads.body:
Hi Mike,
The numbers look good. I have a few questions on region breakdown. I'll annotate the spreadsheet.
Cheers,
Linda

threads.subject: Final June sales report
threads.body:
All,
I've incorporated the feedback. The final sales report is ready for review. Let me know if further changes are needed.
Best,
Mike

threads.subject: Re: Final June sales report
threads.body: Great work, team. Impressive results. Let's discuss this in tomorrow's meeting.\nThanks,\nCEO
